hellasforms.effect.plasmaveil.raised: %s has put up a veil of lightning!
hellasforms.effect.plasmaveil.already: There already is a Plasma Veil!
hellasforms.effect.surgeburrow.spikes: %s's side of the field was lined with crackling spikes!
hellasforms.effect.surgeburrow.already: There are already electrified spikes on %s's side!
hellasforms.effect.electricspikes: Electric spikes were scattered on the ground!
hellasforms.status.electricspikes.affect: %s was zapped by the electric spikes!
hellasforms.effect.aurorainfernalis.rais: Aurora Infernalis engulfed the battlefield in burning light!
pixelmon.abilities.combathedge.start: %s's Combat Hedge shifted into its offensive form!
pixelmon.abilities.combathedge.stop: %s's Combat Hedge retreated into a defensive form!
pixelmon.abilities.jade_emperor: %s's Jade Emperor seized control of the terrain!
pixelmon.abilities.nightmare_realm: %s plunged the battlefield into the Nightmare Realm!
pixelmon.abilities.photonconstruct.trans: %s assembled into its Photon Construct form!
pixelmon.abilities.plasma_aura: %s's Plasma Aura flooded the field with electricity!
pixelmon.effect.shatterstorm: A storm of razor-sharp ice shards barraged the opposing side!
pixelmon.status.shatterstorm.affected: %s was shredded by the storm of shards!
item.pixelmon.eeveeolite.tooltip: When held by any form of Eevee, this item doubles its Special Attack and Speed stats.
item.pixelmon.rusted_bottle_cap.tooltip: Right-click a Pokémon to corrode one random IV to 0.
item.pixelmon.rusted_bottle_cap.success: %s's was corroded by the Rusted Bottle Cap!
pixelmon.interaction.bottlecap.level: %s needs to be at least Lv. 50.
item.pixelmon.exp_candy_xxl.tooltip: Right-click a Pokémon to grant it a tremendous 100,000 experience points.
item.pixelmon.exp_candy_xxxl.tooltip: Right-click a Pokémon to pour 350,000 experience points into it at once.
item.pixelmon.exp_candy_xxxl.success: %s rocketed upward from the mountain of experience!
item.pixelmon.hp_252_ev_capsule.tooltip: Right-click a Pokémon to set its HP EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.hp_252_ev_capsule.success: %s's HP EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.attack_252_ev_capsule.tool: Right-click a Pokémon to set its Attack EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.attack_252_ev_capsule.succ: %s's Attack EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.defense_252_ev_capsule.too: Right-click a Pokémon to set its Defense EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.defense_252_ev_capsule.suc: %s's Defense EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.spatk_252_ev_capsule.toolt: Right-click a Pokémon to set its Special Attack EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.spatk_252_ev_capsule.succe: %s's Special Attack EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.spdef_252_ev_capsule.toolt: Right-click a Pokémon to set its Special Defense EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.spdef_252_ev_capsule.succe: %s's Special Defense EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.speed_252_ev_capsule.toolt: Right-click a Pokémon to set its Speed EVs to 252 instantly.
item.pixelmon.speed_252_ev_capsule.succe: %s's Speed EVs were pushed to their limit!
item.pixelmon.ability_patch_remover.tool: Right-click a Pokémon to strip its hidden ability and grant a random standard ability.
item.pixelmon.ability_patch_remover.succ: %s let go of its hidden ability!
Right-click a Pokémon to shift it into its Hellas form if available.
Right-click a Pokémon to shift it into its Partner Holo form if available.
%s shifted into its Partner Holo form!
item.pixelmon.form_change_ticket_holo.to: Right-click a Pokémon to shift it into its Holo form if available.
item.pixelmon.form_change_ticket_christm: Right-click a Pokémon to shift it into its Partner Christmas form if available.
%s shifted into its Partner Christmas form!
Right-click a Pokémon to shift it into its Christmas form if available.
item.pixelmon.lunar_ball.tooltip: A Poké Ball infused with moonlight. Works best at night, especially under a full moon.
item.hellasforms.generic.ev_max: %s's EVs are already maxed for that stat.
item.pixelmon.diancite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Diancie hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.gyaradosite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Gyarados hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.sceptilite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones, although its shape is a bit different than most of them... Have Hellasian Sceptile hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.hellasforms.wild-egg.tooltip: This egg seems to be from a wild Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.hellasforms.hellasian-egg.tooltip: This egg seems to be from a wild hellasian Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.hellasforms.odd-looking-egg.tooltip: This egg seems to be from a powerful wild Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.hellasforms.sparkly-wild-egg.toolti: This sparkly egg seems to be from a wild Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.hellasforms.sparkly-hellasian-egg.t: This sparkly egg seems to be from a wild hellasian Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.hellasforms.sparkly-odd-looking-egg: This sparkly egg seems to be from a powerful wild Pokemon. It's a mystery what's inside. Maybe ask the Professor about it.
item.pixelmon.hellas_coupon.tooltip: This Coupon is to get more current and old Event and Battle Pass Rewards of the Hellas Region. It can be redeemed at the Hellas Region Admin Shop.
item.pixelmon.deck-of-many-mons.tooltip: This deck of cards is said to be powerful but cursed. Better ask the Professor about it before using it.
item.pixelmon.tyranitarite-hellas.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Tyranitar hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.gardevoirite-hellas.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Gardevoir hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.galladite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Gallade hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.garchompite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Garchomp hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.samurottite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Samurott hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.centiskorchite-hellas.tool: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Centiskorch hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.aegislashite-hellas.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Aegislash hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.goodrite-hellas.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Hellasian Goodra hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.pixelmon.bug_badge_hellas.tooltip: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Bug Gym Leader
item.pixelmon.dark_badge_hellas.tooltip: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Dark Gym Leader
item.pixelmon.dragon_badge_hellas.toolti: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Dragon Gym Leader

item.pixelmon.fairy_badge_hellas.tooltip: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Fairy Gym Leader
item.pixelmon.fighting_badge_hellas.tool: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Fighting Gym Leader

item.pixelmon.flying_badge_hellas.toolti: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Flying Gym Leader
item.pixelmon.ghost_badge_hellas.tooltip: This Badge proves that you've beaten the Hellas Region Ghost Gym Leader

item.hellasforms.hellas_adamantite.toolt: Adamantite! Gleaming and unyielding, this legendary ore pulses with raw, unstoppable energy—perfect for forging unimaginable power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_amazonite.toolti: Amazonite sparkles with an otherworldly green glow, hinting at secrets of the ancients and untold potential in every facet!
item.hellasforms.hellas_amber.tooltip: Amber, golden and alive with trapped energy, seems to hum with the whispers of creatures long past—an essential piece for a mighty creation!
item.hellasforms.hellas_amethyst.tooltip: Amethyst! A dazzling purple gem, radiating mystical vibes, ready to awaken hidden strengths within the hands of a worthy wielder!
item.hellasforms.hellas_ametrine.tooltip: Ametrine glimmers in dual hues of purple and gold, a fusion of elegance and power, whispering that it’s destined for something extraordinary!
item.hellasforms.hellas_apatite.tooltip: Apatite gleams like a shard of pure possibility, holding a mysterious energy that could tip the balance of destiny in your favor!
item.hellasforms.hellas_aquamarine.toolt: Aquamarine shimmers with the serene blues of ocean depths, calming yet potent, promising a surge of hidden power when harnessed!
item.hellasforms.hellas_aventurine.toolt: Aventurine sparkles with flecks of fortune, radiating a lucky, adventurous aura—could this gem unlock a legendary secret?
item.hellasforms.hellas_azurite.tooltip: Azurite’s deep, mesmerizing blue pulls you in, as if it’s guarding an ancient, powerful secret waiting to be discovered!
item.hellasforms.hellas_blue_flourite.to: Blue Flourite gleams like frozen crystal waters, delicate yet brimming with untapped potential for epic transformations!
item.hellasforms.hellas_blue_quartz.tool: Blue Quartz radiates a cool brilliance, as if carved from the very skies themselves—calm, steady, yet full of promise!
item.hellasforms.hellas_blue_topaz.toolt: Blue Topaz sparkles like the morning sun over the ocean, brimming with clarity and a surge of hidden power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_carnelian.toolti: Carnelian blazes with fiery passion, glowing like molten embers—its energy is wild, untamed, and bursting with strength!
item.hellasforms.hellas_chromite.tooltip: Chromite shines with a sleek metallic gleam, whispering of resilience and unyielding durability meant for greatness!
item.hellasforms.hellas_chrysoberyl.tool: Chrysoberyl gleams in golden-green brilliance, like a guardian jewel promising balance and hidden ferocity!
item.hellasforms.hellas_cinnabar.tooltip: Cinnabar pulses with a crimson glow, brimming with volatile energy—it almost feels alive in your hands!
item.hellasforms.hellas_citrine.tooltip: Citrine sparkles with sunny brilliance, radiating warmth and joy while hiding a fierce spark of power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_diamond.tooltip: Diamond, flawless and unbreakable, shines like condensed starlight—pure, dazzling, and brimming with timeless power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_dolomite.tooltip: Dolomite’s soft shimmer hides surprising strength, a quiet powerhouse of stability and mysterious potential!
item.hellasforms.hellas_emerald.tooltip: Emerald glows with vibrant green life energy, a jewel said to connect directly to nature’s raw, unstoppable force!
item.hellasforms.hellas_erythrite.toolti: Erythrite gleams in vivid crimson-pink, an ore so intense it feels like it’s daring you to unlock its hidden strength!
item.hellasforms.hellas_flourite.tooltip: Flourite dazzles in shifting colors, like a rainbow trapped in crystal—its energy is playful yet mysterious!
item.hellasforms.hellas_fuchsite.tooltip: Fuchsite sparkles with shimmering green flecks, as if infused with starlight—energetic, radiant, and full of hidden promise!
item.hellasforms.hellas_garnet.tooltip: Garnet burns with deep red brilliance, a symbol of passion and resilience, glowing like a warrior’s heart forged into stone!
item.hellasforms.hellas_green_flourite.t: Green Flourite shines with a refreshing light, like captured springtime energy, brimming with natural vitality!
item.hellasforms.hellas_hexagonite.toolt: Hexagonite gleams in vibrant lavender hues, its geometric perfection radiating mystical energy and sharp precision!
item.hellasforms.hellas_jade.tooltip: Jade glows with serene green beauty, a timeless gem of harmony that hums with quiet, ancient strength!
item.hellasforms.hellas_jasper.tooltip: Jasper radiates earthy warmth, its patterns telling ancient stories of endurance, stability, and hidden might!
item.hellasforms.hellas_lapis_lazuli.too: Lapis Lazuli sparkles with golden flecks on deep blue seas, a gem said to hold wisdom of the ages!
item.hellasforms.hellas_lazulite.tooltip: Lazulite shines in a rich azure glow, captivating and mysterious, like holding a fragment of the sky itself!
item.hellasforms.hellas_lazurite.tooltip: Lazurite gleams with intense ultramarine energy, bold and commanding, as if it carries the voice of the ocean!
item.hellasforms.hellas_malachite.toolti: Malachite swirls with lush green patterns, a living canvas of nature’s artistry, brimming with vibrant energy!
item.hellasforms.hellas_mithril.tooltip: Mithril gleams with silver-blue brilliance, impossibly light yet strong, a legendary metal fit for heroes!
item.hellasforms.hellas_morganite.toolti: Morganite glows with soft pink radiance, a stone of tenderness and compassion that warms the soul!
item.hellasforms.hellas_moss_agate.toolt: Moss Agate holds forests within, its green inclusions like tiny landscapes teeming with life and growth!
item.hellasforms.hellas_nephrite.tooltip: Nephrite radiates protective strength, its smooth green surface whispering of balance and ancient guardianship!
item.hellasforms.hellas_neptunite.toolti: Neptunite shimmers in black crystal with crimson flashes, like molten fire hidden beneath the ocean’s depths!
item.hellasforms.hellas_obsidian.tooltip: Obsidian is volcanic glass, sharp and commanding, forged from fire and fury into a dark mirror of power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_onyx.tooltip: Onyx gleams in bands of midnight and snow, a stone of focus and resilience, steady as unshakable will!
item.hellasforms.hellas_opal.tooltip: Opal dances with a rainbow of colors, mystical and ever-changing, like a portal to untold magic!
Orange Flourite glows warmly, crackling with energetic sparks, a cheerful yet powerful gem!
item.hellasforms.hellas_peridot.tooltip: Peridot shines with lively green brilliance, radiating growth and vitality in every glimmer!
item.hellasforms.hellas_peridotite.toolt: Peridotite exudes raw, primal strength, a rock of enduring power straight from the earth’s core!
item.hellasforms.hellas_phosgenite.toolt: Phosgenite glimmers in golden-orange hues, mysterious and captivating, full of untamed energy!
Phosphophyllite shines with translucent aqua brilliance, fragile yet mesmerizing, like liquid sunlight frozen in crystal!
Phosphosiderite glows with soft purples and pinks, a gem of gentle mystery hiding potent energy within!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pink_ruby.toolti: Pink Ruby radiates warmth and delicate power, a gem of affection and hidden strength!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pink_topaz.toolt: Pink Topaz shimmers like the first blush of dawn, elegant, precious, and brimming with gentle force!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pupurite.tooltip: Pupurite sparkles in royal purple, a mysterious stone exuding intrigue, power, and rare beauty!
Purple Flourite glows with mystical energy, its deep color promising wisdom and arcane secrets!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pyrargyrite.tool: Pyrargyrite gleams like fiery red garnet, vibrant and intense, a gem that demands attention and respect!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pyrite.tooltip: Pyrite shines like golden sunlight trapped in stone, bold and brilliant, a gem of ambition and energy!
item.hellasforms.hellas_pyroxmagnite.too: Pyroxmagnite glows with fiery intensity, a gem forged from heat and pressure, fierce and unstoppable!
item.hellasforms.hellas_quartz.tooltip: Quartz radiates clarity and power, a versatile gem that channels energy and strengthens focus!
item.hellasforms.hellas_red_flourite.too: Red Flourite pulses with dynamic energy, a stone of courage and unyielding force, fiery as a blazing flame!
item.hellasforms.hellas_rose_quartz.tool: Rose Quartz glows with gentle pink warmth, a soothing gem of love, compassion, and calming energy!
item.hellasforms.hellas_ruby.tooltip: Ruby burns with passionate red fire, a symbol of vitality, courage, and the heart’s burning desire!
item.hellasforms.hellas_sapphire.tooltip: Sapphire shimmers deep blue like the night sky, wise and regal, a gem of insight and tranquility!
item.hellasforms.hellas_sapphirine.toolt: Sapphirine glows in soft blue-green hues, rare and precious, radiating serenity and mystique!
item.hellasforms.hellas_smoky_quartz.too: Smoky Quartz exudes grounding energy, dark and calming, like a shadowed crystal of stability!
item.hellasforms.hellas_soapstone.toolti: Soapstone is smooth and tactile, soft yet durable, a gem that hums with warmth and earthy energy!
item.hellasforms.hellas_sulfur.tooltip: Sulfur glows with bright yellow energy, vibrant and lively, a spark of elemental power!
item.hellasforms.hellas_tanzanite.toolti: Tanzanite shines with violet-blue splendor, rare and exquisite, a gem of mystique and elegance!
item.hellasforms.hellas_titanite.tooltip: Titanite gleams with strong, metallic energy, a stone of endurance and strength for epic creations!
item.hellasforms.hellas_topaz.tooltip: Topaz glows golden and bright, a gem of joy and clarity, energizing and uplifting all who behold it!
item.hellasforms.hellas_turquoise.toolti: Turquoise shimmers in calming blues and greens, a protective gem that whispers ancient wisdom and serenity!
Yellow Flourite glows with sunny brilliance, bright and cheerful, a gem that sparks creativity and joy!
ability.NightmareRealm.description: Summons Misty Terrain on entry and doubles the user's Defense and Special Defense while the mist lingers.
ability.JadeEmperor.description: Commands Psychic Terrain on entry and, while the field is shrouded in mist, boosts Attack and Special Attack by 50%.
ability.VampiricFangs.description: Nullifies Ghost- and Dark-type moves, siphoning 25% of its max HP whenever one would hit.
ability.DragonInstall.description: Unleashes Psychic Terrain on entry and raises Attack by 33% while psychic power crackles across the field.
hellasforms.abilities.VampiricFangs.acti: %s's vampiric fangs drank in the attack!
hellasforms.abilities.DragonInstall.acti: Dragon Install flooded the field with psychic energy for %s!
ability.StormForce.description: Sets Electric Terrain alight and grants +1 priority to the user's status moves while the storm is raging.
ability.CrystalLens.description: Ignores the foe's evasion entirely while sharply boosting critical-hit chances.
ability.PlasmaBlade.description: Greatly powers up slicing techniques and supercharges Electric-type attacks.
hellasforms.abilities.PlasmaBlade.activa: Arcs of plasma blade energy danced around %s!
ability.CombatHedge.description: Switches Hellasian Shaymin between offensive and defensive forms based on its remaining HP.
ability.PoisonSkin.description: Damages contact attackers and has a 30% chance to poison them on touch.
ability.DemonArmor.description: Takes double damage from Dark-type moves but reduces contact damage to a third.
ability.SpiritOfTheMuses.description: Doubles the chance of additional move effects and immediately copies any dance move used in battle.
ability.PlasmaAura.description: Summons Electric Terrain on entry; while it persists, boosts Attack and Special Attack by 50% and Speed by 10%.
hellasforms.abilities.PlasmaAura.activat: A crackling plasma aura flared around %s!
ability.PhotonAura.description: Summons harsh sunlight on entry and boosts Attack, Special Attack, and evasion while the sun blazes.
ability.DystopianTunes.description: Boosts claw moves by 50%, empowers sound moves by 30%, and halves damage taken from opposing sound-based attacks.
ability.GraveMistake.description: Powers up super-effective moves by 25% but causes 25% more damage from super-effective hits.
ability.Hydrosphere.description: Summons rain on entry, doubles Water-type move power, halves incoming Fire damage, and blocks or cures burns.
ability.PhalanxStance.description: Prevents stat drops; instead raises Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
ability.PhotonConstruct.description: Transforms Hellasian Zygarde into its Photon Construct form when its HP falls below 75%, then reverts after battle.
hellasforms.abilities.PhotonConstruct.ac: Photon Construct assembled %s into a new form!
ability.SuperconductiveScales.descriptio: Summons Electric Terrain and snow on entry, healing during hail but sizzling in harsh sunlight.
ability.SwordOfJustice.description: Sharply boosts slicing moves and makes all attacks deal 20% more damage to Dark-, Dragon-, Ghost-, Poison-, and Fairy-type foes.
ability.SandInvasion.description: Summons a sandstorm on entry and doubles the user's Speed while the sands rage.
attack.draconic_greed.description: %s takes its enemies' life force to satisfy its hunger.
attack.jade_light.description: %s fires a beam of jade light at the opponent, dealing damage and having a chance to raise its Special Attack by one stage.
attack.moonlight_dance.description: %s dances in the moonlight, increasing its Speed, Attack, and Special Attack by one stage with a chance to confuse its opponent.
attack.pyroclastic_flow.description: %s erupts into a tyrannical dance of magma that scorches everything nearby.
attack.corrode.description: The user sprays a concentrated, corrosive substance on the target. This move is super-effective on Steel types.
attack.hitch_kick.description: The user jumps off the ground and delivers two high kicks in succession. This move hits twice, with each hit having its own accuracy check. Never misses if the target is taller than the user.
attack.plasma_fangs.description: The user charges its fangs with plasma and bites the opponent where it's weakest. If this attack defeats the opponent, Plasma Veil is set or refreshed.
attack.plasma_veil.description: The user sets up a barrier of arc lightning, halving damage from all incoming attacks. Fails if not used on Electric Terrain.
attack.burnout.description: The user switches out in a super-hot burst of flames. This move also has a chance of burning the opponent.
attack.draconic_shout.description: The user lets out a deep, growling shout imbued with ancient energy. The mystical power of this attack may raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
attack.fairy_circle.description: The target is surrounded by an enchanted stone circle, attacking them with their own item and destroying it in the process. Deals 1.5x damage if an item is successfully removed.
attack.greek_fire.description: This incredibly effective fire was thought to be lost to time. It is said to be able to burn even on water.
attack.metallic_scales.description: The user, Hellasian Flygon, sheds its coat of sharp, metallic scales and fires them at the opponent before growing stronger ones in their place. This attack has a 50% chance to sharply raise the user's Special Defense.
attack.oilslick.description: The target is switched out using a toxic slick of oil. This move has a chance to poison.
attack.rabid_claw.description: The user rabidly slashes at the target. This attack is more likely to be a critical hit, and may paralyze or flinch the target.
attack.soul_sap.description: The user utters a dark fae enchantment, stealing away part of the target's soul and recovering 3/4 of the damage dealt. This move hits both opposing Pokémon in a double battle.
attack.supernova.description: The user explodes in a vibrant burst of light. Gravity and a layer of spikes are set, then the user faints. This move usually goes last.
attack.afterburner.description: Requires a Charge Turn. Raises Speed by 2 stages turn 1, attacks turn 2.
attack.cutting_edge.description: This move has an increased Critical Hit Ratio.
attack.eroding_tides.description: Locks the user into this move for three turns where they cannot switch out or use other moves. Has a high chance to lower opposing Defense, but when the move ends, lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
attack.isbrand.description: Has a chance to burn or freeze the opponent.
attack.petalblade.description: Has an increased chance to be a critical hit and has priority on Grassy Terrain. When it hits, the user takes recoil.
attack.sea_fog.description: Requires a Charge Turn. Removes all field effects and stat changes.
attack.shock_drill.description: The user spins like a live wire, drilling into every nearby foe. This may leave the targets paralyzed.
attack.shatterstorm.description: Guaranteed to land as a critical hit. Applies Ice type spikes to the opponent.
attack.surge_burrow.description: The user dives underground in an electrical charge, clearing its side of hazards before erupting to scatter electric spikes on the foe's field.
attack.snowstorm_fury.description: This move is guaranteed to land a critical hit. The move cannot be used twice in a row.
attack.bleeding_jaw.description: Does super effective damage to fairy types.
attack.radiant_energy.description: This move's power raises the more times it hits in a row. Guaranteed to land when the weather is clear.
attack.venom_ambush.description: The user digs underground and strikes with a chance to poison next turn.
attack.draconic_jaw.description: The user bites the target with a chance to burn, freeze, paralyze, confuse or poison them. This move has a seperate chance to inflict each of these status conditions.
attack.photon_darts.description: Shoots darts that may paralyze the target.
attack.pixie_crashout.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
attack.tiro_finale.description: The user fires off an extravagant shot of energy. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss for the remaining Turn.
attack.aurora_infernalis.description: Sets up Aurora Veil; Burns both user and target.
attack.stinging_nettle.description: Applies Grass type Splinters to opponents hit by this move. (Splinters apply Damage Over Time for 5 turns that is the same type as the move that applied it.
attack.prism_pressure.description: Has a 20% chance to lower Accuracy by 1 stage.
attack.purification.description: The user takes damage equal to 20% HP, removing status conditions and raising offensive stats by +1 to an allied Pokemon.
attack.aegis_driver.description: Boosted by Sharpness. Calculates damage with users Defense stat and might paralyze the Target (20%).
attack.andromeda_crusher.description: Once used, opponents attacks are guaranteed to land, and deal increased damage to the user until the user's next turn.
attack.draconic_revolt.description: Drains for 15% of the damage dealt and has a 10% chance to raise the user's Speed by one stage.
attack.thermodynamics.description: Changes Hellasian Hoopa's form and burns the target.
attack.icy_immolation.description: Sets up hail, Electric Terrain, and Aurora Veil at the cost of 50% HP.
attack.tactical_retreat.description: Attacks the enemy, heals for 25% of the damage dealt, and retreats.
